full_summary:
### Tender Announcement for Motive Fuel Tank
#### Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the Department of National Defence's requirement for the provision and delivery of a new motive fuel tank to the Department of National Defence (DND) in Ontario.

The procurement is set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB), which aims to promote Indigenous participation in federal procurement. Suppliers interested in participating in this tender must demonstrate that they meet the criteria for Indigenous businesses as defined under PSIB and agree to comply with all the strategy's requirements.

#### Scope of Work
The scope of the work includes the provision and delivery of a new motive fuel tank, along with associated parts and hardware, to the DND in Ontario.

#### Tender Details

* **Title**: W6888-234812 Motive Fuel Tank RFP
* **Reference Number**: WS4406696586
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4406696586
* **Publication Date**: 2024-04-11
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-04-30T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 2024-04-29
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-04-01

#### Contracting and Procurement Information

The tender is being managed by the PWGSC, with the Department of National Defence serving as the end-user entity. Suppliers interested in participating in this tender must submit their proposals to the PWGSC.

Contractors wishing to participate in this tender must access the Government of Canada's procurement platform, [Supplier Link](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19375981?extsite=MTkzNzU5ODFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==), and submit their proposals online.

### Contact Information
For further information regarding this tender, please contact Julie Simms, who is the focal point for this procurement. She can be reached via email at [julie.simms@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:julie.simms@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca). Please note that the contract process will be carried out entirely online, and any questions or requests for clarification should be directed to the technical point of contact provided in the tender documents.
